note: I live in Los Angeles, California where I write fiction, nonfiction, and plays. My work has appeared in Wired, Los Angeles Times, Washington Post, The Rumpus, Business Insider, Advocate, Chicago Tribune, The Maine Review, STORGY Magazine, Writers Resist, Five:2:One, Cowboy Jamboree, Full Grown People, The Offbeat, Reunion: The Dallas Review. My work also appears in the anthologies Made in L.A., Vol. 2 and Writers Resist: The Anthology 2018. I was nominated for a Pushcart Prize.
